article_title: The Top 10 Regulatory Battles Facing Tech Companies In 2016

article_metadata.description: Uber regulatory battle guru Bradley Tusk caps 2016's upcoming regulatory battles affecting tech companies, from startups like Airbnb and DraftKings to public players like Amazon and Google.
article_metadata.author: Alex Konrad
